snippet.title: Desperados III - E3 Trailer
snippet.description:
Desperados is back! 
John Cooper and his friends just arrived in Los Angeles for E3 Expo. Don't worry, they won't die in this town - but you just might. A lot.

Don't forget to quicksave when you get your hands on Desperados III for the first time at THQNordic's booth #823 in the South Hall!
----
Website: http://desperadosgame.com
Steam: http://n.thq.com/1iyB30lAeDg
